name: NBA SuperCard: All Star Battle
description:
NBA SuperCard is the legendary card battle game where rising stars meet basketball’s Superstars. Play the latest card battle game, pitting iconic NBA athletes against modern stars in an all-out battle on the court.

Collect cards across generations of NBA and WNBA superstars, train them, build up their unique stats and bring old and new rivalries to life. Dunk on your rivals in various modes. Build your deck from hundreds of collectible NBA stars and icons to form the ultimate team.

Battle and win! Play and win and earn rewards in weekly and monthly events. Keep fighting to unlock exclusive new basketball cards, new packs, and new tiers.

Get on the court and immerse yourself in basketball action in NBA SuperCard.

NBA SUPERCARD FEATURES:

COLLECT CARDS - BASKETBALL LEGENDS
Collect hundreds of collectible NBA stars and icons
Build a deck of top-tier players with different strengths to build the ultimate team
Train your players and advance their stats
Collect iconic NBA and WNBA athletes: Damian Lillard, Zion Williamson, Anthony Davis, Candace Parker, Ben Simmons, Jayson Tatum and more

BATTLE ON THE COURTS - CARD BATTLE MODES
Always-on Quick Game mode with unlimited play
Practice your game solo and train your team
Champions tournament mode where you compete against others worldwide to win top cards
Daily and weekly quests and challenges to help you level up

CARD UPDATES ALL THE TIME
Collect cards to build your team from new packs released daily
Weekly events with limited edition cards
Card tiers and special edition cards released every month

Get on the court with the best deck in the league with NBA SuperCard, the ultimate card battle experience.
